        public no.ntnu.stud.ubilearn.models.TrainingLevel getLevelNo(int position)
        Function returns a TrainingLevel object specified by the position in the list of levels. This is based on testdata.
        Parameters:
        position - - The position in the list of levels.
        Returns:
        An object of type TrainingLevel or null if object in specified position does not exist.
